entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.26.1
entry.content:
üì¶ ImmichFrame Release v1.0.26.1 ‚Äì May 25, 2025

What's Changed

‚ö° Fixes

üìì Documentation

entry.title: New release for Immich-Frame: v1.0.27.0
entry.content:
üì¶ ImmichFrame Release v1.0.27.0 ‚Äì June 15, 2025

This release brings powerful new features, quality-of-life improvements, and essential refactorings that make ImmichFrame more flexible and maintainable than ever.

üÜï Highlights

üë• Multi-Account Support

You can now connect multiple Immich accounts! This is ideal for combined libraries from different users.

üéûÔ∏è Pan-Effect

Added a pan animation effect to slowly move across images while displaying them ‚Äì perfect for a more dynamic and lively presentation of static photos.

üìä Progress Bar Settings

Customize the progress indicator to suit your frame's visual style.

Multiaccount-Support

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features

  • Feat: Landscape split mode by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/390 (reverted)
  • Feat: Pan option by @pete1450 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/391
  • Feat: Multiple Immich account support by @jpg0 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/374
  • Feat: Progressbar setting by @3rob3 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/400

üìì Documentation

  • Docs: Prettify the code-blocks on the apps.md page by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/379
  • Docs: Frameo webview update as list by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/380
  • Docs: Prettify landing page by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/389

üî® Maintenance

  • Chore: Cleanup fire-and-forget asset loading by @jpg0 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/376
  • Refactor: Use interface implementations in DI by @jpg0 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/377
  • Refactor: config loading by @jpg0 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/381
  • Chore: Update docusaurus to newest version by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/395
  • Revert "Feat: Landscape split mode" by @JW-CH in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/397
  • Maintenance: Add GitHub workflow to run tests by @jpg0 in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/399

üöÄ Other changes

  • Update apps.md by @DevilsDesigns in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/378

New Contributors

  • @jpg0 made their first contribution in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/376
  • @DevilsDesigns made their first contribution in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/378
  • @pete1450 made their first contribution in https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/pull/391

Full Changelog: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame/compare/v1.0.26.2...v1.0.27.0
